name: Sapiens
description: Sapiens built the first End-to-end Encrypted Privacy AI. Through our models, users can seamlessly use AI without exposing their personal privacy-critical data. Data is stored in a Fully-Homomorphic Encrypted (FHE) database, which is accessible via your Sapiens Badge (on-chain credential). The team consists of previous AI researchers at Cornell, Accenture, Bittensor, Ava Labs, and OpenSea who have previously built multiple NLP companies and published in the leading AI research journals.
